edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers

Class ArcGISImageServiceLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.Layer
        • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.DynamicMapServiceLayer
          • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.ArcGISImageServiceLayer

  • public class ArcGISImageServiceLayer
extends DynamicMapServiceLayer
    Allows you to work with an image map service resource exposed by the ArcGIS Server REST API.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ArcGISImageServiceLayer create(java.lang.String uri,
                             ArcGISImageServiceLayer.Options options)
        Creates a new ArcGISImageServiceLayer object. A URL is a required parameter. This layer also takes some optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        uri - - URL to the ArcGIS Server REST resource that represents a map service.
        options - - Optional parameters.
        Returns:
        ArcGISImageServiceLayer

      • create

        public static ArcGISImageServiceLayer create(java.lang.String uri)
        Creates a new ArcGISImageServiceLayer object. A URL is a required parameter.
        Parameters:
        uri - - URL to the ArcGIS Server REST resource that represents a map service.
        Returns:
        ArcGISImageServiceLayer

        Returns:

      • getBands

        public final com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<Band> getBands()
        The raster bands that the raster dataset is composed of and their statistics. The length of this array gives the number of bands and the array index represents the band ID.
        Returns:
        JsArray

      • getCompressionQuality

        public final double getCompressionQuality()
        Current compression quality value. The compression quality controls how much loss the image will be subjected to. Only valid with JPG image types.
        Returns:
        float

      • getCopyrightText

        public final java.lang.String getCopyrightText()
        Copyright string as defined by the image service.
        Returns:
        String

      • getDescription

        public final java.lang.String getDescription()
        Copyright string as defined by the image service.
        Returns:
        String

      • isDisabledClientCaching

        public final boolean isDisabledClientCaching()
        When true, images are always requested from the server and the browser's cache is ignored. This should be used when the data supporting the map service changes frequently.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getFormat

        public final java.lang.String getFormat()
        The output image type. Known values: png8 | png24 | jpg | bmp | gif Default value: png8
        Returns:
        String

      • getInterpolation

        public final java.lang.String getInterpolation()
        Current interpolation method. The interpolation method affects how the raster dataset is transformed when it undergoes warping or when it changes coordinate space.
        Returns:
        String

      • getMaxImageHeight

        public final int getMaxImageHeight()
        The maximum image height , in pixels, that the map service will export. Requires ArcGIS Server version 10.1 or greater. (As of v2.6)
        Returns:
        int

      • getMaxImageWidth

        public final int getMaxImageWidth()
        The maximum image width, in pixels, that the map service will export. Requires ArcGIS Server version 10.1 or greater. (As of v2.6)
        Returns:
        int

      • getMaxRecordCount

        public final int getMaxRecordCount()
        The maximum number of results that can be returned from query, identify and find operations. Requires ArcGIS Server version 10.1 or greater. (As of v2.6)
        Returns:
        int

      • getMosaicRule

        public final MosaicRule getMosaicRule()
        Specifies the mosaic rule when defining how individual images should be mosaicked.
        Returns:
        MosaicRule

      • getPixelSizeX

        public final float getPixelSizeX()
        Size of pixel in X direction.
        Returns:
        float

      • getPixelSizeY

        public final float getPixelSizeY()
        Size of pixel in Y direction.
        Returns:
        float

      • getPixelType

        public final java.lang.String getPixelType()
        The pixel type of the image service. Pertains to the type of values stored in the raster, such as signed integer, unsigned integer, or floating point. Integers are whole numbers, whereas floating points have decimals. Known values: C64 | C128 | F32 | F64 | S8 | S16 | S32 | U1 | U2 | U4 | U8 | U16 | U32 | UNKNOWN
        Returns:
        String

      • getRenderingRule

        public final RasterFunction getRenderingRule()
        Specifies the rendering rule for how the requested image should be rendered. View the Raster Functions help topic in the REST help for more details.
        Returns:
        int

      • getTimeInfo

        public final TimeInfo getTimeInfo()
        Temporal information for the layer, such as time extent. If this property is null or not specified, then the layer does not support time-related operations.
        Returns:
        TimeInfo

      • getVersion

        public final double getVersion()
        The version of ArcGIS Server the image service is published to, e.g. 9.3, 9.31, 10.
        Returns:
        double

      • exportMapImage

        public final void exportMapImage()
        Exports a map using values as specified by ImageServiceParameters. On completion, MapImage is returned.

      • exportMapImage

        public final void exportMapImage(MapImageExportHandler handler)
        Exports a map using values as specified by ImageServiceParameters. On completion, MapImage is returned.
        Parameters:
        handler - - The function to call when the method has completed. The arguments in the function are the same as the onMapImageExport event.

      • exportMapImage

        public final void exportMapImage(ImageServiceParameters params)
        Exports a map using values as specified by ImageServiceParameters. On completion, MapImage is returned.
        Parameters:
        params - - Input parameters assigned before exporting the map image.

      • exportMapImage

        public final void exportMapImage(ImageServiceParameters params,
                  MapImageExportHandler handler)
        Exports a map using values as specified by ImageServiceParameters. On completion, MapImage is returned.
        Parameters:
        params - - Input parameters assigned before exporting the map image.
        handler - - The function to call when the method has completed. The arguments in the function are the same as the onMapImageExport event.

      • setBandIs

        public final void setBandIs(int[] bandIds)
        Sets the R,G,B of the exported image to the appropriate ImageService Band ID. BandIds are zero based.
        Parameters:
        bandIds - - Array of band IDs to use in the exported image.

      • setBandIs

        public final void setBandIs(int[] bandIds,
             boolean doNotRefresh)
        Sets the R,G,B of the exported image to the appropriate ImageService Band ID. BandIds are zero based.
        Parameters:
        bandIds - - Array of band IDs to use in the exported image.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setCompressionQuality

        public final void setCompressionQuality(float quality)
        Sets the compression quality of the exported image. Only valid with JPG image format.
        Parameters:
        quality - - Sets the compression quality of the exported image. Only valid with JPG image format.

      • setCompressionQuality

        public final void setCompressionQuality(float quality,
                         boolean doNotRefresh)
        Sets the compression quality of the exported image. Only valid with JPG image format.
        Parameters:
        quality - - Sets the compression quality of the exported image. Only valid with JPG image format.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setDisableClientCaching

        public final void setDisableClientCaching(boolean disable)
        Sets whether images are always requested from the server and the browser's cache is ignored. This should be used when the data supporting the map service changes frequently.
        Parameters:
        disable - - When true, browser client side caching is disabled.

      • setImageFormat

        public final void setImageFormat(java.lang.String imageFormat)
        Set the image format.
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - - Valid values are png | png8 | png24 | jpg | pdf | bmp | gif | svg.

      • setImageFormat

        public final void setImageFormat(java.lang.String imageFormat,
                  boolean doNotRefresh)
        Set the image format.
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - - Valid values are png | png8 | png24 | jpg | pdf | bmp | gif | svg.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setInterpolation

        public final void setInterpolation(java.lang.String interpolation)
        Sets the interpolation method. The interpolation method affects how the raster dataset is transformed when it undergoes warping or when it changes coordinate space.
        Parameters:
        interpolation - - Interpolation value defined in ImageServiceParameters Constants Table.

      • setInterpolation

        public final void setInterpolation(java.lang.String interpolation,
                    boolean doNotRefresh)
        Sets the interpolation method. The interpolation method affects how the raster dataset is transformed when it undergoes warping or when it changes coordinate space.
        Parameters:
        interpolation - - Interpolation value defined in ImageServiceParameters Constants Table.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setMosaicRule

        public final void setMosaicRule(MosaicRule mosaicRule)
        Sets the mosaic rule of the layer to the specified value. The mosaic rule defines how individual images should be mosaicked. Refreshes the layer to reflect the mosaic rule.
        Parameters:
        mosaicRule - - The mosaic rule.

      • setMosaicRule

        public final void setMosaicRule(MosaicRule mosaicRule,
                 boolean doNotRefresh)
        Sets the mosaic rule of the layer to the specified value. The mosaic rule defines how individual images should be mosaicked. Refreshes the layer to reflect the mosaic rule.
        Parameters:
        mosaicRule - - The mosaic rule.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setRenderingRule

        public final void setRenderingRule(RasterFunction renderingRule)
        Sets the rendering rule of the layer to the given value. Refreshes the laeyr to reflect the rendering rule.
        Parameters:
        renderingRule - - The new rendering rule.

      • setRenderingRule

        public final void setRenderingRule(RasterFunction renderingRule,
                    boolean doNotRefresh)
        Sets the rendering rule of the layer to the given value. Refreshes the laeyr to reflect the rendering rule.
        Parameters:
        renderingRule - - The new rendering rule.
        doNotRefresh - - Added at version 2.2 When true the layer will not refresh the map image. The default value is false.

      • setUseMapTime

        public final void setUseMapTime(boolean update)
        Determine if the layer will update its content based on the map's current time extent. Default value is true. (As of v2.2)
        Parameters:
        update - - When false the layer will not update its content based on the map's time extent. Default value is true.

      • addMapImageExportHandler

        public final void addMapImageExportHandler(MapImageExportHandler handler)
        Fires when the map export is completed.
        Parameters:
        handler - - Contains the properties of a dynamically generated map image.
